description: The animal in Peter Gordon comes out.
title: Black and White and Read All Over
title_page: Black and White and Read All Over - The New York Times
text:
MONDAY PUZZLE — Quick one today. I have the flu, and it hurts to type. Yes, I did get my flu shot, and you should too. Even if I have one strain of the flu, there are at four other kinds that I won’t be getting, thanks to the flu shot, and I won’t be spreading those germs among people who are immunosuppressed.
On the upside, Peter Gordon returns with a nod to an old joke. I would laugh, but that hurts too. You can laugh for me.
Tricky Clues
37A: Cluing ANDY as “Samberg of ‘Brooklyn Nine-Nine’” is easy enough for a Monday, but could it also be a nod to Will Shortz’s appearance on the show last year?
